Package controller

Executes commands issued by the GUI, such as making changes to the model or loading and saving data.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddComponent Implements the action for adding a component to the sandbox.
AddWire Implements the action for connecting components with a wire.
Command Performs operations on the data model.
Controller Communicates between the model and gui.
DeleteSelection Implements the actions for deleting all objects selected in the gui.
InsertWireNode Implements the actions for adding a new node to a wire, splitting a segment.
MoveSelection Implements the action for a moving a selection.
 

Package controller Description

Executes commands issued by the GUI, such as making changes to the model or loading and saving data. Provides Undo functionality with the Command design pattern.

The main classes in the controller package are:

  • Controller: Communicates between the gui and the model, and manages the collections of Command objects
  • Command: The base class for creating commands
